SELECT t1.unid, t1.code, t1.pCode, t1.name AS text, t1.url AS attributes, t1.icon AS iconCls FROM os_menu t1
AND t1.pCode = #{pCode}
AND t1.pCode = 'NONE'
AND t1.`status` = #{status} AND t1.`resourceType` = 0

SELECT t.unid, t.`name`, t.`code`, t.url, t.description, t.icon, t.pCode, t.seq, CASE t.`status` WHEN '0' THEN '无效' WHEN '1' THEN '有效' ELSE '' END AS statusName, CASE t.resourceType WHEN '0' THEN '菜单' WHEN '1' THEN '按钮' ELSE '' END AS resourceTypeName, t.createTime, t.level, CASE t.level WHEN '0' THEN '一级菜单' WHEN '1' THEN '二级菜单' WHEN '2' THEN '三级菜单' WHEN '3' THEN '四级菜单' ELSE '' END AS levelName FROM os_menu AS t WHERE 1=1
AND t.`level` = #{level}
AND t.`name` LIKE CONCAT_WS(#{menuName},"%","%",NULL)
ORDER BY t.createTime DESC

SELECT
FROM os_menu AS t WHERE 1=1 AND t.resourceType = 0 AND t.level = 0

SELECT
FROM os_menu AS t WHERE 1=1 AND t.code = #{pCode}
